author: Dan Ripley For Mailonline
title: Tottenham v Stoke City, EPL LIVE score | Daily Mail Online
text:
12:05 It may be cup final day, but we have some Premier League action to get through 
And it's no minor action either. Today's only Premier League game comes from north London as Tottenham Hotspur aim to win their tenth consecutive match at White Hart Lane when they face Stoke City. 
Good afternoon and follow all of Sportsmail's coverage of the action where Spurs will hope to climb back into second in the table.
